description:
******** 50% OFF *********
•	Situps are the, one of the best exercise for increasing your core strength, fitness and general health. 
•	If you're very serious about increasing your strength, follow this six week training program and you'll be on your way to completing 200 consecutive situps!
•	Situps are important and best leg exercise.
•	With only 30 minutes per week, this app is going to help you get fit and do 100 pushups.
•	Perform an initial test first & then this number will dictate your targets over the ensuing six week period.
•	This app also helps you to decide the target by performing an initial test.
•	If you are following the training program strictly you can perform 200 situps.
•	You can definitely gain strength using this application & performing the training program.
Features: 
•	Ideal app for gaining the strength. 
•	Predefined 6 week program, so you no need to remember schedule.
•	Predefined timer defined in this for taking rest.
•	Initial test will decided your schedule on 6 week programmer.
